articles.title: Now It's McDonald's Turn. A Data Breach Hits The Chain In Asia - NPR
articles.description: Unauthorized activity on McDonald's network exposed the personal data of some customers in South Korea and Taiwan, the company says. No customer payment information was exposed.
articles.content:
A sign is displayed outside a McDonald's restaurant in Des Moines, Iowa. The company said customers' personal data in South Korea and Taiwan was accessed in a data breach.

articles.title: Taiwan says Thailand prioritising AstraZeneca shots for itself - The Star Online
articles.description: Thailand is prioritising for itself AstraZeneca Plc's Covid-19 vaccines produced in the South-East Asian nation because of the severity of the pandemic there, thus delaying deliveries to Taiwan, President Tsai Ing-wen said on Friday.
